LanguageData.AdvancedAntitoxinKidney.label: advanced antitoxin kidney
LanguageData.AdvancedAntitoxinKidney.description: An advanced antitoxin kidney built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural kidney, has advanced toxin filtering system, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedMedicalLiver.label: advanced medical liver
LanguageData.AdvancedMedicalLiver.description: An advanced medical liver built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural liver, can secreted more kind of immune system, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedEnergizedLiver.label: advanced energized liver
LanguageData.AdvancedEnergizedLiver.description: An advanced energized liver built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural liver, can secreted special hormone that make user more energetic, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.MSE_AdvancedPowerBlade.label: advanced power blade
LanguageData.MSE_AdvancedPowerBlade.description: An advanced power blade built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural shoulder, has scyther blade attached to it, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedPowerArm.label: advanced power arm
LanguageData.AdvancedPowerArm.description: An advanced power arm built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural arm, have high blunt damage, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedPowerClaw.label: advanced power claw
LanguageData.AdvancedPowerClaw.description: An advanced power claw built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural hand, has sharp claw attached to it, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedBreathingSupportRib.label: advanced breathing support rib
LanguageData.AdvancedBreathingSupportRib.description: An advanced breathing support rib built by an archotech. It can make user breath more ease and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedRelaxationRib.label: advanced relaxation rib
LanguageData.AdvancedRelaxationRib.description: An advanced relaxation rib built by an archotech. It can make user feel more relaxed and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedColdRegulatorRib.label: advanced cold regulator rib
LanguageData.AdvancedColdRegulatorRib.description: An advanced cold regulator rib built by an archotech. It can support blood to regulate cold temperature and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
LanguageData.AdvancedHeatRegulatorRib.label: advanced heat regulator rib
LanguageData.AdvancedHeatRegulatorRib.description: An advanced heat regulator rib built by an archotech. It can support blood to regulate hot temperature and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
